content.text:
# Draft:Government Post Graduate College in Gopeshwar

The Government Post Graduate College Gopeshwar, located in Gopeshwar (Chamoli), Uttarakhand, is a public institution established in 1966. It offers a variety of full-time undergraduate and postgraduate programs, including B.Sc., M.Sc., B.Com., B.A., and BBA. The college is accredited with an 'A' grade by the National Assessment and Accreditation Council (NAAC) and is affiliated with Sri Dev Suman Uttarakhand University.
